radiographic_examinations.findings: Common bile duct is dilated up to 1.2 cm; gallbladder walls thickened up to 0.6 cm; pancreas borderline thickened; small amount of fluid mesentery near the pancreas; mild thickening of small bowel wall likely a sequela of active inflammation; small amount of free fluid noted within the pelvis; no evidence of focal lesions or other abnormalities.
